sentences: Töötavad inimesed on meie kõige väärtuslikum ressurss.
context: The Estonian word 'töötavad' is the 3rd person plural present tense form of the verb 'töötama', which means 'to work'. It translates to English as 'work' or 'are working' when referring to multiple people. The word can refer to employment, functioning, or operating in a general sense.
